lead_paragraph: The newly appointed coach, Mathias Berthold, is taking a long-term view on his chances of emulating the times when Austria regularly scored 1-2-3 sweeps of World Cup podiums.
snippet: The newly appointed coach, Mathias Berthold, is taking a long-term view on his chances of emulating the times when Austria regularly scored 1-2-3 sweeps of World Cup podiums.
